schema.description: This view joins data from multiple SAP S4 HANA tables (VBAP, VBAK, VBPA, KNA1, PRCD_ELEMENTS, TCURX, VBPE) to provide a comprehensive view of sales order data at both header and item levels.  It includes pricing details, customer information, and order quantities. The data is grouped at the sales order item level (VBELN, POSNR).

columns.name: SalesDocument_VBELN
columns.description: Sales document number from VBAK header

columns.name: CreatedBy_ERNAM
columns.description: User who created the sales order from VBAK header
